chapter.title: Optinal exercise: Selection service for deleting data

section.title: Implement the RemoveTodoHandler handler
section.para: Implement RemoveTodoHandler so that the selected Todo is deleted.

section.title: Validate that the deletion works
section.para:
Run your application and select a line in your JFace table. Select your
Edit Remove Todo
menu entry.
Press the "Load Data" button to update the table. Validate that the selected Todo is not available anymore.

note.para:
Currently your parts are not reacting to changes in your data model and you have to press the Load Data button in your TodoOverviewPart part. You will fix that after you learned about the event bus of Eclipse in
.

section.title: Test the context menu for deletion
section.para:
In
you defined a context (popup) menu for your table. As the RemoveTodoHandler class is already correctly implemented, you should be able to delete selected items with the Delete context menu without any changes in the RemoveTodoHandler handler class.
Delete one todo item. Use the Load Data button and validate that the delete item has been removed from the data model.
